full_summary:
**Project Leader/Executive Senior (Level 3) - Request for Proposal**

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01009547
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-TSPS2023-13/A
**Publication Date:** October 7, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** October 25, 2022, 2:00 PM EDT
**Procurement Category:** Services
**Method of Supply:** Competitive Bidding
**Classification:** Human Resource Services, Business Consulting/Change Management; Project Management Services
** período**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting proposals for the provision of Task and Solutions Professional Services, specifically for a Project Leader/Executive Senior (Level 3) to support Director Aerospace Equipment Business (DAEBM) 7 and its Sustainment Centre of Expertise Air (CoE Air) activities. This requirement is only open to pre-qualified suppliers under Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS).

**Location of Work:**

* Region(s): National Capital Region
* Specific Location(s): 455 Boulevard de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC

**Security Requirements:**
* Supplier Security Clearance: FSC - Secret
* Security Level: None (document safeguarding)

**Contract Requirements:**
* Contract Duration: Two years with three irrevocable option years
* Project Management Services: 230 days per year
* Project Leader/Executive: One (1) contract for a Senior Project Leader/Executive

**Document Submission:**
* The Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly to pre-qualified suppliers.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Pre-Qualification Requirements:**
* Suppliers must be pre-qualified under Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS).
* Suppliers must meet the standard qualification criteria for the Category 3: Project Leader/Executive.

**Additional Information:**
* The Government Electronic Tendering System (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders) is not available for this requirement.
* Suppliers who are interested in becoming pre-qualified for TSPS services must contact Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) at spts.tsps@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

 **Point of Contact:**
* Name: Sally, Sharon
* Email: sharon.sally@forces.gc.ca
* Telephone: 819-939-8990

Please note that the project closing date has expired
